div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version 📍
CodeDisplay
399588009Pathologic TNM stage grouping
371513001Presence of direct invasion by primary malignant neoplasm to nerve
405921002Percentage of neoplasm involved by necrosis
371509008Status of peritumoral lymphocyte response
444696007Status of specimen involvement by multifocal invasion
396631001Surgical margin observable
396324006Surgical margin involved by neoplasm in excised tissue specimen
370052007Tumor invasion

Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 📍
CodeDisplay
102034-6Pathology report microscopic observation in Specimen
74574-5Macroscopic observation [Interpretation] in Specimen Narrative
33739-4Lymphatic.small vessel.invasion [Identifier] in Specimen by CAP cancer protocols
33740-2Venous.large vessel.invasion [Identifier] in Specimen by CAP cancer protocols
21889-1Size Tumor
42030-7Multiple tumors reported as single primary Cancer
92831-7Lymph nodes with metastasis [#] in Cancer specimen
81168-7Site of adjacent organ or tissue involvement Cancer specimen
84891-1Pathology report post neoadjuvant therapy assessment in Specimen
33737-8Distance of tumor from closest margin

title.value: Set de Valores para Observaciones Biopsia

description.value: Observaciones realizadas durante el informe de biopsia
